name: DrugsNonOpioidTestsByScreenOrUnspecifiedMethodInBlood
title: Drugs [Non opioid] (Tests by Screen or Unspecified Method in Blood)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with non-opioid Overdose and Poisoning),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: drugs of abuse, non-opioid, blood),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
